text:
Objective
B.Tech (CSE, Data Science) graduate seeking an IT industry role to apply my skills in development,
analytics, and cloud solutions.  Enthusiastic about innovative projects in fast-paced environments, combining
technical acumen and effective communication.

Professional Summary
Resourceful computer science graduate with hands-on project delivery in web development, ML solutions,
and cloud integration.  Detail-oriented and collaborative, with experience supporting teams and handling
challenging business scenarios.  Quick learner, driven by results and continual improvement.

Education
GIET University, GunupurJul 2022 – Jun 2025
Bachelor of Technology in Computer ScienceCGPA: 6.98/10, Data Science Specialization
CTTC, BhubaneswarJul 2022
Diploma in Mechatronics75.6%
DAV Public School, PuriJul 2019
CBSE83.6%

Technical Skills
Programming Languages:Python, Java, C#, SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Frameworks:Django, Flask, Node.js, React.js, ASP.NET, Bootstrap, FastAPI
Tools:VS Code, Git, Android Studio, Jira, Figma, ServiceNow, Power BI, Streamlit
Data Science:Pandas, Scikit-learn, OpenCV, TensorFlow, ML, Data Visualization, Forecasting
Databases/Cloud:MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Azure basics, SQLite
CRM/ERP:Salesforce Trailhead, ServiceNow
System/Networking:Windows/Linux, LAN/Wi-Fi troubleshooting, HTTP/HTTPS, DNS, VPN
General:Problem solving, debugging, agile teamwork, technical documentation
Internships and Experience
Wipro TalentNextRemote
Project Intern2024
–Developed, tested, and deployed full-stack web apps using .NET stack and SQL
–Built dynamic UIs and scalable backend systems; integrated REST APIs
–Active code reviews, trouble-shooting, and collaborative development in agile teams
SalesforceRemote
.NET Developer InternMay 2024 – Sep 2025
–Gained CRM fundamentals via Trailhead:  data security, user management, workflow automation
–Designed, customized, and deployed business process solutions for end users
Logozon Edutech Pvt. LtdRemote
Data Analytics InternMay 2023 – Jun 2023
–Built Power BI dashboards integrating multiple data sources for real-time reporting
–Performed data cleansing, profiling, and visualization, delivering actionable business insights
–Created user documentation and provided support for dashboard usage

Projects
Rainfall Prediction using Satellite Data|Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV2025
–ML-based forecast model leveraging satellite imagery for early warning; advanced data preprocessing and
time-series modeling
–Project Repo:  github.com/Octavian-ai/Rainfall-Prediction
Loan Repayment Risk Platform|Python, Streamlit, PostgreSQL2025
–Built interactive dashboards with ML models for financial risk analysis on real loan datasets
–Project Repo:  github.com/Vatshayan/Loan-Repayment-ML

Deskbot - AI Desktop Assistant|Python, Tkinter, API Integration2024
–Developed cross-platform productivity assistant supporting web search, messaging and automation
–Integrated OpenAI, weather and emails using respective APIs
–Project Repo:  github.com/pranavsindura/Deskbot
Website Vulnerability Analyzer|Python, Flask, Bootstrap2023
–Secured web tool for scanning vulnerabilities (XSS, SQLi, header flaws), auto-generating reports
–Project Repo:  github.com/MdAmiruddin/Website-Vulnerability-Analyzer

Finalist, College Hackathon (2024):  Developed real-time data logger and dashboard

Volunteer, TechFest (2023):  Coordinated technical events and managed sponsors
Mentor, Peer Programming:  Helped juniors with Data Science and Python basics

Won “Best Project” in college miniproject expo (2023)
Top 5% performer in Kaggle Python challenge
Completed Google Data Analytics Certification
Maintained CGPA>6.9 throughout engineering
